text: The Tour of Taihu Lake is a staged cycling race held in China annually in November. It has been held since 2010, but the first edition was a one-day race. The 2010 and 2011 editions were rated 1.2 and 2.2, and was upgraded to 2.1 in 2013. Jakub Mareczko holds the record for most number of stage wins, with 18, as of the end of the 2018 edition of the race.http://www.procyclingstats.com/race.php?id=182222&c;=6 ==Winners== ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Cycle races in China Category:UCI Asia Tour races Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2010 Category:2010 establishments in China Category:Autumn events in China
title: Tour of Taihu Lake
